${ModID}:Whirligig.NAME: Whirligig
${ModID}:Whirligig.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:Sliiiiither.NAME: Sliiiiither
${ModID}:Sliiiiither.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw !M! to 3 additional cards.

${ModID}:TailFlail.NAME: Tail Flail
${ModID}:TailFlail.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Randomize the cost of !M! random card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Sneckpot.NAME: Sneckpot
${ModID}:Sneckpot.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 to !D! damage. Roll the damage X times and take the highest result.

${ModID}:WhipNSnapper.NAME: Whip 'n Snapper
${ModID}:WhipNSnapper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply 0 to !M! Weak and 0 to !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Gulp.NAME: Gulp
${ModID}:Gulp.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Apply Poison|@=Enemy loses HP} equal to the amount of energy spent this combat.{!M!|>0= NL ( !M! energy spent this combat)}

${ModID}:SnazzySwagger.NAME: Snazzy Swagger
${ModID}:SnazzySwagger.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw {!M!|>1=!M! cards. Discard !M! cards|@=!M! card. Discard !M! card}. NL Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand.

${ModID}:SneckoEyes.NAME: Snecko Eyes
${ModID}:SneckoEyes.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. At the start of your turn, draw 2 cards.

${ModID}:Shedding.NAME: Shedding
${ModID}:Shedding.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, randomize the cost of the {!M!|>1=!M! highest cost cards|@=highest cost card} in your hand.
